id.description: Identifier of this DDBC.Instruction. Must be unique in the scope of the Resource Manager, for at least the duration of the session between Resource Manager and CEM.

execution_time.description: Indicates the moment the execution of the instruction shall start. When the specified execution time is in the past, execution must start as soon as possible.

abnormal_condition.description: Indicates if this is an instruction during an abnormal condition

actuator_id.description: ID of the actuator this Instruction belongs to.

operation_mode_factor.description: The number indicates the factor with which the OMBC.OperationMode should be configured. The factor should be greater than or equal to 0 and less or equal to 1.
